name: pnp-list-formatting-tile-layout-example-with-formatting
title: Items in Tile Layout with images and Formatting for Doclib
shortDescription: This sample uses tileProps element to format the tile layout  for document libraries.
longDescription: This sample uses tileProps element to format the tile layout  for document libraries.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
